attributes.action: Have all the buses for London become electric and eco-friendly
attributes.background: Show how London can positively contribute to climate change with no petrol buses

rejection.details:
We can only accept petitions about things the Government or Parliament are directly responsible for.

Decisions about the London bus network are a matter for Transport for London and the Mayor of London, not the UK Government or Parliament.

The London Assembly has its own petitions process. You can find out more about how to petition the London Assembly here: https://www.london.gov.uk/about-us/london-assembly/petitions
